Verses: 1 idho, Senaigalin Karththaraagiya Aandavar Erusalemilirundhum Yoodhaavilirundhum Sagalavidhamaana Aadharavugalaagiya Appamengira Ellaa Aadharavaiyum, Thanneerengira Ellaa Aadharavaiyum;
2 paraakkiramasaaliyaiyum, Yuththaveeranaiyum, Nyaayaadhipadhiyaiyum, Theerkkadharisiyaiyum, Saasthiriyaiyum, Mooppanaiyum;
3 aimbadhuperukku Adhipadhiyaiyum, Ganamporundhinavanaiyum, Aalosanaikkaaranaiyum, Thozhilgalil Saamarththiyamullavanaiyum, Saadhuriyanaiyum Vilakkuvaar.
4 vaalibarai Avargalukku Adhipadhigalaagath Tharuven Engiraar; Pillaigal Avargalai Aaluvaargal.
5 janangal Odukkappaduvaargal; Oruvarukkoruvarum, Ayalaanukku Ayalaanum Virodhamaayiruppaargal; Vaaliban Mudhirvayadhullavanukkum, Keezhmagan Menmaganukkum Idumbu Seyvaan.

6 appozhudhu Oruvan Than Thagappan Veettaanaagiya Than Sagodharanaip Pidiththu: Unakku Vasthiram Irukkiradhu, Nee Engalukku Adhipadhiyaayiru; Kettukku Inamaana Indhak Kaariyam Un Kaiyin Keezhaavadhaaga Endru Solla;
7 avan Annaalile Than Kaiyai Uyarththi: Naan Seerppaduththugiravanaayirukkamaatten; En Veettile Appamumillai, Vasthiramumillai; Ennai Janangalukku Adhipadhiyaaga Vaikkavendaam Enbaan.

8 enendraal Erusalem Paazhaakkappattadhu, Yoodhaa Vizhundhupoyitru; Avargal Naavum, Avargal Kiriyaigalum, Karththarudaiya Magimaiyin Kangalukku Erichchal Undaagaththakkadhaaga Avarukku Virodhamaayirukkiradhu.

9 avargal Mugappaarvai Avargalukku Virodhamaai Saatchiyidum; Avargal Thangal Paavaththai Maraikkaamal, Sodhom Ooraaraippola Velippaduththugiraargal; Avargal Aaththumaavukku Aiyo! Thangalukke Theemaiyai Varuviththukkollugiraargal.
10 ungalukku Nanmaiyundaagum Endru Needhimaangalukku Sollungal; Avargal Thangal Kiriyaigalin Palanai Anubavippaargal.
11 dhunmaarkkanukku Aiyo! Avanukkuk Kedu Undaagum; Avan Kaigalin Palan Avanukkuk Kidaikkum.

12 pillaigal En Janangalai Odukkugiravargalaayirukkiraargal; Sthreegal Avargalai Aalugiraargal. En Janame, Unnai Nadaththugiravargal Unnai Mosampokki, Nee Nadakkavendiya Vazhiyai Azhiththuppodugiraargal.
13 karththar Vazhakkaada Ezhundhirundhu, Janangalai Nyaayantheerkka Nirkiraar.

14 karththar Thamadhu Janaththin Moopparaiyum, Adhin Prabukkalaiyum Nyaayam Visaarippaar. Neengale Indha Dhraatchaththottaththaip Patchiththuppotteergal; Sirumaiyaanavanidaththil Kollaiyitta Porul Ungal Veedugalil Irukkiradhu.
15 neengal En Janaththai Norukki Sirumaiyaanavargalin Mugaththai Nerikkiradhu Ennavendru Senaigalin Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar.

16 pinnum Karththar Sollugiradhaavadhu: Seeyon Kumaaraththigal Agandhaiyaayirundhu, Kazhuththai Neriththu Nadandhu, Kangalaal Maruttippaarththu, Oiyaaramaai Nadandhu, Thangal Kaalgalil Silambu Olikkath Thirigiraargal.
17 aadhalaal Aandavar Seeyon Kumaaraththigalin Uchchanthalaiyai Mottaiyaakkuvaar; Karththar Avargal Maanaththaik Kulaippaar.
18 annaalile Aandavar Avargaludaiya Aabaranangalaagiya Silambugalaiyum, Suttigalaiyum, Piraichchindhaakkugalaiyum,
19 aarangalaiyum, Asthakadagangalaiyum, Thalaimukkaadugalaiyum,
20 sirapooshanangalaiyum, Paadhasarangalaiyum, Maarkkachchaigalaiyum, Sugandhabaranigalaiyum,
21 thaayiththugalaiyum, Modhirangalaiyum, Mookkuththigalaiyum,
22 vinodha Vasthirangalaiyum, Saalvaigalaiyum, Porvaigalaiyum, Kuppigalaiyum,
23 kannaadigalaiyum, Sallaakkalaiyum, Kullaakkalaiyum, Thuppattaakkalaiyum Urindhupoduvaar.

24 appozhudhu, Sugandhaththukkup Padhilaagath Thurkkandhamum, Kachchaikkup Padhilaagak Kayirum, Mayirchchurulukkup Padhilaaga Mottaiyum, Aadambaramaana Vasthirangalukkup Padhilaaga Rattukkachchum, Azhagukkuppadhilaagak Karugippogudhalum Irukkum.
25 un Purushar Katkaththinaalum, Un Belasaaligal Yuththaththilum Vizhuvaargal.
26 avaludaiya Vaasalgal Dhukkiththup Pulambum; Aval Verumaiyaakkappattuth Tharaiyile Utkaaruvaal Engiraar.
